channel.title: Load loop in surface tension
channel.description: So recently I got to the section in surface tension with the warehouse filled with explosives. I left after a while. When I returned and used the auto save (the one where the scientist tells you to proceed with extreme caution) The explosion happens immediately, even with godmode on. I tried loading an earlier save to see if this fixes the problem, it does not. Can someone hep me please?

item.title: Load loop in surface tension
item.dc:creator: Corestealer
item.description:
So recently I got to the section in surface tension with the warehouse filled with explosives. I left after a while. When I returned and used the auto save (the one where the scientist tells you to proceed with extreme caution) The explosion happens immediately, even with godmode on. I tried loading an earlier save to see if this fixes the problem, it does not. Can someone hep me please?
